replies.body:
M&G in a nutshell:

http://i.imgur.com/X27wHhh.jpg[\img]

Good thing this was posted in Gamepl- wait, no, it wasn't, and even if it was, nobody would ever ever say that. I'M SORRY! I DIDN'T MEAN IT! SPARE ME, M&G OVERLORDS!
We are currently deciding your fate. However, since your meme was mediocre on the dank level, your chances may not be as slim as you thought.
I want to upvote this once for the comic and once for the summoner name.
took the word right out my mouth my good man. want to upvote you 2 times for the want to upvote the summonor name.

I think what you meant to show was:

http://i.imgur.com/URCQYBp.jpg[\img]

After mentioning it earlier... what choice did I have?

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/005/342/129969639840.gif
Here is my upvote
Excuse me, but are you acting like Zyra gets skins fairly often? Or hell, as an average skin reciever? I'm triggered.
I tried thinking of the 2nd champion, and Zyra popped up for some reason, since she's getting Dragon Sorceress.
Ahri would have been the best choice
Or Jinx
no, annie would have been best, she has so many skins -_-
That's more because she's stayed viable for her entire existence which has been since the game was made.
Ye, before Dragon Sorceress she was the 7th champion on "Haven't recieved a skin for the longest period of time" list, even counting the ugly and legacy SKT one.
Why not Teemo
dude just got the devil one and omega squad
yorick need skin more than zyra
Well who's got bigger fanbase and playrate...? But yes, Yorick should get more skins..

Alas, Poor Yorick, He has no playerbase
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Defenestration is a legitimate business practice.
Whoever invented that word deserves a cookie.

So True...
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Only one I disagree with is the party IP weekend. People need to stop complaining about how a free-to-play game isn't free enough.

Considering it takes literally YEARS of playing to get decent champion pool and runes for them (not to mention if you want to upgrade all your favorite champs to mastery 6 and 7 it takes even longer because of riots retarded requirements for that), a party IP weekend is hardly a big ask.
seriously..whos the idiot that thought i was a good idea to tie the mastery system to the freaking hextec crafting crap?
wait how is masteries related to crafting? i thought you just leveled up champions as you played.
Level 6 and 7 mastery requires use of the crafting system.
Wait but isnt that just a coin you get and have to use? or do you actually have to do something in crafting to unlock the level?

For mastery 6 you need 500 blue essence and mastery 7 needs 600. On average that's like... 3200 IP if you aren't unlucky. 

I have the tokens to be mastery 6 and 7 on like 8 champions but they just sit there cuz I don't have the IP, and I'd rather buy champions or runes.
Which is fine because mastery does not affect gameplay. It's the opposite.

It doesn't directly affect it, but I don't think anyone was saying that. It indirectly affects it though cuz you have to choose between gameplay or mastery. Buying mastery or buying runes and champions? Feelsbadman.

You also need champion shard for that champion or blue essence.
Which are both technically free.
they did make it more skill based though requiring you to get S ranks to get to 6 and 7.

shouldn't that be enough rather than having to wait for those impossible to get key fragments or buying champion shards for almost 2000 ip until you finally get enough blue essence or get lucky and get that champion shard?
https://i.imgflip.com/1lq5k2.jpg
https://i.imgflip.com/1lqmd3.jpg

people dont like ascension?  
Dirty imperfects

edit:joke (though perfect ascensions a rare icon)
I am proud of my perfect ascension icon.
I don't get the Part 1: 3rd one. Red's MR was nerfed, Fiddle has buffs on the PBE, and Lee Sin was nerfed.

> [{quoted}](name=TheHappyReaperz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NgAXQZsh,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-03-19T19:09:52.667+0000)
>
> I don't get the Part 1: 3rd one. Red's MR was nerfed, Fiddle has buffs on the PBE, and Lee Sin was nerfed.

*facepalm*
Its not a joke, if its reality.
The reality is a joke.

Then if the joke is reality, jokes aren't jokes, reality is a joke. Unless the joke joked about reality, and it really was reality really being reality. However, if that is true, reality is real, jokes are jokes, and jokes cannot be reality. Despite this, reality was really a joke, meaning that if the joke was real, reality was a joke.

the joke is the first 2 people are the ones that are likely to be done or have been done before while the third guy gives a supposedly reasonable response, which the CEO ignores and throws him out the window for because people being reasonable or intelligent is not allowed.
Why does this guy still work for that company? I'd normally take being thrown out of a window once as as sign that I should leave...and sue those fuckers.
but lee sin isn't why the jungle is stale

> [{quoted}](name=Big Lincoln,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NgAXQZsh,comment-id=001a,timestamp=2017-03-20T12:28:33.079+0000)
>
> but lee sin isn't why the jungle is stale

lee sin might not be the only reason, but lee sin has been THE reason jungle has been stale since his release.

The real solution is to make another Lee Sin. 
Then both junglers can be cool.
What about we make all junglers lee sin then everyone is viable and can be picked :D

That's it.
We make every jungler an Energy champion. That way they can't possible be hurt by giving up blue and can't go Oom. 
Like Lee Sin.

> [{quoted}](name=DeceasedL0ved0ne,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NgAXQZsh,comment-id=001a0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-20T20:08:50.766+0000)
>
> That's it.
> We make every jungler an Energy champion. That way they can't possible be hurt by giving up blue and can't go Oom. 
> Like Lee Sin.

we should just make 9 other lee sin clones with name lee sin 1-9 so everyone can be lee sin that way we can measure skill rather than champion select shenanigans.
